detaileddescription.para: constructor arg_size := number of bit in set
number of bits in the set can be call from the host or the device
number of bits which are set to 1 can only be called from the host
set all bits to 1 can only be called from the host
set all bits to 0 can only be called from the host
set all bits to 0 can only be called from the host
set i'th bit to 1 can only be called from the device
set i'th bit to 0 can only be called from the device
return true if the i'th bit set to 1 can only be called from the device
used with find_any_set_near or find_any_unset_near functions returns the max number of times those functions should be call when searching for an available bit

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION Kokkos::pair< bool, unsigned > Kokkos::Bitset< Device >::find_any_set_near
memberdef.name: find_any_set_near

detaileddescription.para: find a bit set to 1 near the hint returns a pair< bool, unsigned> where if result.first is true then result.second is the bit found and if result.first is false the result.second is a new hint

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION Kokkos::pair< bool, unsigned > Kokkos::Bitset< Device >::find_any_unset_near
memberdef.name: find_any_unset_near

detaileddescription.para: find a bit set to 0 near the hint returns a pair< bool, unsigned> where if result.first is true then result.second is the bit found and if result.first is false the result.second is a new hint

briefdescription.para: A thread safe view to a bitset.
